Wesize.prompt: Randomly changes the size of Mario or the current capture!
Wesize.title: Wesize

See Myself Out.prompt: Kicks me out the stage I'm in right now and sends me wherever I was before
See Myself Out.title: See Myself Out

Change Gravity.prompt: Changes my gravity to a random direction for 3 seconds (Continues adding time if redeemed multiple times)
Change Gravity.title: Change Gravity

Up we go.prompt: Flings me upward into the air!
Up we go.title: Up we go

Cappy? Nah.prompt: Deletes Cappy from existence... Can only be restored by dying, warping to a checkpoint, or entering a sub area!
Cappy? Nah.title: Cappy? Nah

Random Kingdom.prompt: Sends me off to a completely random kingdom!
Random Kingdom.title: Random Kingdom

Highway to Death.prompt: Starts counting down my coin counter. If it hits zero, I die! If it's already started and it is redeemed again, the coins start draining faster!
Highway to Death.title: Highway to Death

Whispy Winds.prompt: Starts blowing the player with wind in a random direction for 9 seconds (Continues adding time if redeemed multiple times)
Whispy Winds.title: Whispy Winds

Hot Floor.prompt: Makes Mario constantly jump to get off the ground for 10 seconds! (Continues adding time if redeemed multiple times)
Hot Floor.title: Hot Floor

Stick Flip.prompt: Inverts my control sticks for 10 seconds! (Continues adding time if redeemed multiple times)
Stick Flip.title: Stick Flip

Hot Tub Stream.prompt: Makes me start to swim through the air for 8 seconds! (Continues adding time if redeemed multiple times)
Hot Tub Stream.title: Hot Tub Stream

Dance Party.prompt: START THE PARTY! (1 redeem per person)
Dance Party.title: Dance Party

Moon Magnet.prompt: Warps the closest moon to me!
Moon Magnet.title: Moon Magnet

Fly me to the Moon.prompt: Sends me straight to Moon Kingdom!
Fly me to the Moon.title: Fly me to the Moon
